Posts.Content: Sep 3, 2015 11:22AM LizzyBoo65 wrote: Spinach, (I love your username) How are things going? I'm new to this site and am waiting for a second mammogram and ultrasound. My primary care doc went ahead and scheduled me with a surgeon in advance "just in case". That will help if it turns out to be "something" that needs to be biopsied. I sure wish there was some way the tests could be hurried along. It is horrible waiting.
